sys_element_mapping.value:
asset_record={{Updated_1.current.sys_id}}^state=open^description=You have indicated that you want to stop usage of the asset within 30 days. As a result of this decision you are required to complete the actions below, before completing this task. You will no longer be allowed to use this asset: this will be monitored by the IT department. If you have any questions on how to complete the actions below please contact the IT department for further information and instructions on how to safely stop usage of the asset.
When marking this task as complete, you confirm you have completed these actions: - You, and your team members, have stopped usage of the asset - You have removed all data stored in the asset - You have deleted all accounts & other remaining information (on users, payment details, etc.) in the asset and cancelled any contracts or subscriptions. ^assignee={{Updated_1.current.owned_by.sys_id}}

asset_record={{Updated_1.current.sys_id}}^state=open^description=You have indicated that you want to stop usage of the asset within 30 days. As a result of this decision you are required to complete the actions below, before completing this task. You will no longer be allowed to use this asset: this will be monitored by the IT department. If you have any questions on how to complete the actions below please contact the IT department for further information and instructions on how to safely stop usage of the asset.
When marking this task as complete, you confirm you have completed these actions: - You, and your team members, have stopped usage of the asset - You have removed all data stored in the asset - You have deleted all accounts & other remaining information (on users, payment details, etc.) in the asset and cancelled any contracts or subscriptions. ^assignee={{Updated_1.current.owned_by.sys_id}}

state=open^asset_record={{Updated_1.current.sys_id}}^description=The asset’s triage has indicated that the risk level is too high to be Business-Led IT, therefore further assessment is required. A detailed risk assessment as per risk management policy is required, therefore work together with the Asset Owner to assess the asses in detail and to remediate the risk. This can be done by onboarding the asset as an IT offering, thereby formally handing over the management and the risk of the asset to the IT department, or alternatively the asset owner can be onboarded to an alternative existing asset and the usage of the current asset be stopped safely using existing processes to remove data, accounts, and subscriptions.
After completing the detailed risk assessment, and remediating the risk(s), mark this task as completed.
^assignee=fd-scripted
